projects.name: ERC-20 Token Generator Dapp
projects.description: Developed a decentralized application (Dapp) using React and Solidity, generating over 100 ERC-20 tokens, including burnable and mintable options. Deployed and verified smart contracts on the Ethereum blockchain via Etherscan, increasing transparency and security, resulting in a 50% enhancement in code quality. Generated unique token hashes upon creation, exemplified by the successful launch of the test token MDA, reducing token creation time by 40% and optimizing efficiency. Delivered an intuitive user interface, significantly enhancing the token creation experience, leading to a 30% boost in user satisfaction.

projects.name: MERN Based Events Platform
projects.description: Engineered a robust and responsive events management application using the MERN stack. Optimized event booking with an intuitive contact form, efficiently processing user inquiries and securely storing data in MongoDB, reducing processing time by 20% and increasing booking efficiency by 25%. Designed the system to handle high volumes of bookings, ensuring a seamless user experience across various devices, leading to a 35% increase in customer retention.

projects.name: OOP Based Banking System
projects.description: Engineered a sophisticated bank management system applying Object-Oriented Programming (OOP) principles in C++. Integrated crucial banking functionalities such as account creation, money withdrawals, balance inquiries, and new account setups, resulting in a increase in operational efficiency. Prioritized security and operational efficiency, reducing transaction errors by 15% and enabling effortless financial management.

projects.name: MERN NGO Application (Cryptomus Payment Gateway)
projects.description: Developed a fully responsive NGO website and performed API testing with Nodemon. Integrated the Cryptomus payment gateway, streamlining secure donations and improving performance by 20%, increasing donation processing speed by 25%. Enhanced accessibility and modernized the donation experience, resulting in a 10% increase in user engagement.
